name: Enhanced Expense Tracker with Monthly Total

parameters.query:
=INSERT INTO expenses (amount, category, description, phone_number) 
VALUES ( 
  {{ $('Webhook').first().json.body.data.message.conversation.split(' ')[2] }}, 
  '{{ $('Webhook').first().json.body.data.message.conversation.split(' ')[3] || "general" }}', 
  '{{ $('Webhook').first().json.body.data.message.conversation.split(' ')[1] }}', 
  '{{ $('Webhook').first().json.body.data.key.remoteJid }}' 
) 
RETURNING *;

=SELECT 
  SUM(amount) as total,
  COUNT(*) as count
FROM expenses 
WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM date) = EXTRACT(MONTH FROM CURRENT_DATE)
  AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CURRENT_DATE)
  AND phone_number = '{{ $('Webhook').first().json.body.data.key.remoteJid }}'
